title: Airtable Connection
description: OAuth-based integration with Airtable platform for accessing spreadsheet databases and automation workflows

specs.title: Create Airtable connection with valid OAuth credentials
specs.given: valid Airtable OAuth client ID and secret from Airtable developer console
specs.when: user creates a new Airtable connection
specs.then: connection is created successfully and OAuth flow can be initiated

specs.title: Reject Airtable connection with invalid credentials
specs.when: user attempts to create Airtable connection
specs.then: system returns validation error indicating credential issue

specs.title: Update Airtable connection name
specs.when: user updates connection name to a valid unique value
